message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

The paper deals with the problem of semantic segmentation of motion capture data using machine learning techniques. The proposed method involves the use of convolutional neural networks for image segmentation and dilated temporal convolutions for the extraction of temporal information. This work is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR) as it deals with the analysis and synthesis of motion data. It also involves the use of machine learning techniques (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) for the segmentation task. Finally, the paper is relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) as it deals with the processing of motion capture data.
